attacks.name: Barrier Attack
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Registeel Star by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Final Laser
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like. If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left and Registeel Star is the only Pokémon you have in play, put 6 damage counters instead.
